definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Rafael Nadal rejoices after defeating Robin Soderling in the men's final June 6.
sentences.chinese: 纳达尔击败而高兴在男子决赛6月6日索德林。

sentences.english: NIKOLAY DAVYDENKO: Shock, maybe just for press shocked, because Nadal always winning here.
sentences.chinese: 很雷，但是是压迫的雷，因为纳达尔在这儿总能赢。

sentences.english: Rafael Nadal serves to John Isner during the BNP Paribas Open in California.
sentences.chinese: 在加州法国巴黎银行公开赛上纳达尔向伊斯内尔发球。

sentences.english: Rafa always plays kind of the same.
sentences.chinese: 纳达尔总是打着相同的比赛。

sentences.english: Nadal beat Britain's Andy Murray in four sets in his semi-final.
sentences.chinese: 在半决赛中，纳达尔在四局中击败英国的穆雷。

sentences.english: Nadal returned to announce he felt cramp in his thigh.
sentences.chinese: 纳达尔从头承受拜候，说他年夜腿抽筋了。

sentences.english: Star gazers can find Nadal's asteroid between Mars and Jupiter and the 22-year-old has himself been invited to the Majorcan observatory to view it himself.
sentences.chinese: “纳达尔”小行星位于火星和木星之间。

sentences.english: At night, Nadal will play Fish.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，纳达尔将对阵费什。

sentences.english: "It was a hard moment for me, " Nadal admits.
sentences.chinese: “对我来说这是一个艰难的时刻，”纳达尔承认。

sentences.english: That is what Rafa Nadal is doing incredibly well.
sentences.chinese: 纳达尔在那方面做的难以置信地优秀。

sentences.english: Oh, Soderling is also the only man ever to beat Nadal at the French. No big deal.
sentences.chinese: 索德林还是唯一在法网击败过纳达尔的人。

sentences.english: Associates at Nadel's firm have told clients that the company's funds appear to be empty.
sentences.chinese: 纳达尔的同事们已经告诉客户，公司已经快没钱了。

definition: Wimbledon Championships (tennis)/abbr. for 溫布爾登網球公開賽|温布尔登网球公开赛[Wen1 bu4 er3 deng1 Wang3 qiu2 Gong1 kai1 sai4]
the net of justice/rigorous process of the law/the long arm of the law
variant of 叮嚀|叮咛[ding1 ning2]
Ryder Cup (US and Europe golf team competition)
